summary: The catalog folder manages the resolution, retrieval, and caching of dataset manifests. It acts as a middle layer that translates dataset identifiers and version aliases (like 'latest') into concrete, validated manifest objects while optimizing performance through conditional HTTP-style caching.
responsibilities: Resolving 'latest' version pointers to specific immutable version hashes.
Implementing a local filesystem cache for manifests with ETag and Last-Modified support.
Providing an abstract interface for manifest storage backends (S3, HTTP, Local).
Migrating legacy AWS S3 URIs to modern B2 storage locations during manifest parsing.
Validating manifest structure and content after retrieval.
Handling conditional requests to minimize bandwidth for unchanged manifests.
